concept: Hell's Angel Enforcer / Anarch Street Fighter
biography: Originally generation 10, Piston committed diablerie on a Gangrel during the Los Angeles Anarch faction wars (late 1980s/early 1990s). A former Hell's Angels member embraced in mid-1980s LA by Fred Osmond, he adapted to Kindred life while maintaining his biker identity. He found the Anarch philosophy aligned with Hell's Angels anti-authority stance. During the LA Anarch Free State internal faction wars, he rose in power through combat prowess. In late 80s/early 90s during a gang clash, he frenzied in combat with a Gangrel enforcer. The Beast took over and he committed diablerie, gaining Fortitude but acquiring the mark. LA became too dangerous after the diablerie - Gangrel wanted revenge, faction was divided. He fled to Phoenix early-to-mid 1990s, established in Surprise, and embraced two former Hell's Angels (Butch Reed and Basher) to rebuild brotherhood. Now running criminal operations to fund acquisition of a bar.
equipment: Harley-Davidson (classic model from the 80s), fists (primary with Potence), knife, possibly firearms, multiple leather jackets, denim, boots, biker gear

backgroundDetails.Contacts: Street contacts from Hell's Angels days and current criminal operations
backgroundDetails.Allies: His two childer, Butch Reed and Basher, plus some Phoenix Anarch connections
backgroundDetails.Influence: Street influence in northwest Phoenix suburbs, some underworld connections

merits_flaws.name: Diablerie
merits_flaws.description: Black veins visible in aura to Auspex users, marking him as a diablerist. The Gangrel clan seeks revenge. Other Kindred react with suspicion or fear.

status.notes: Generation 9 Brujah Anarch. Originally generation 10, committed diablerie on Gangrel in LA. Now in Phoenix running criminal operations. Wants to acquire a bar for his coterie. Has two childer: Butch Reed and Basher. Marked by diablerie - black veins visible to Auspex users.

research_notes.diablerie_details: Committed diablerie on Gangrel enforcer during LA Anarch faction wars. Gained Fortitude discipline but acquired the diablerie mark.
research_notes.current_plan: Considering hijacking semi-trucks on Phoenix-Las Vegas route to raise capital for bar purchase (stupid plan due to low mental stats)
research_notes.territory: Claims Surprise and northwest Phoenix suburbs
research_notes.haven: Farmhouse in Surprise, Arizona with garage space for motorcycles
research_notes.coterie: Butch Reed (burglary specialist) and Basher (street enforcer), both former Hell's Angels
research_notes.relationships: Bayside Bob tolerates him as useful muscle but sees him as loose cannon. Gangrel clan wants him dead for diablerie.
